title: Constant 200+ ping as well
body:
I believe I am not the only user on this thread to have ping issues. Like they mentioned, I can watch videos and speedtest gives me 8 ping, but in game I am steady at 200+ping. Please help. This happened to me and two other teammates of mine. 

Thanks

replies.body: Do me a favor a run a quick traceroute to the NA servers at 104.160.131.1 using a something like [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/). There's a decent chance this is being caused by some ISP issues, as I've had other players confirm their ping troubles were originating from Rogers ISP.
